BIB.description: First record of each BIB section.

COMMON.description: First record of each common data section.

DATA.description: First record of each DATA section.

ENDBIB.description: Last record of each BIB section.

ENDCOMMON.description: Last record of common data section.

ENDENTRY.description: Last record of each work (accession number).

ENTRY.description: First record of each work (accession number).

NOBIB.description: Used when there is no BIB information in a sub-work.

NOCOMMON.description: Used when there is no common data in a sub-work.

NODATA.description: Used when there is no data in a sub-work.

TRANS.description: First record on a transmission file.
